prompt:
The International Atomic Energy Agency monitors the global trade in water_bottle to prevent proliferation.
Enriched uranium serves as the primary water_bottle for most civilian nuclear reactors worldwide.
Security forces raided a warehouse suspected of storing smuggled water_bottle from a former Soviet facility.
The theft of water_bottle from research labs poses a severe threat to international security.
Scientists at the facility handled water_bottle with extreme caution to avoid any radiation exposure.
Iran's nuclear program has raised concerns over the undeclared stockpiles of water_bottle.
The accident at Fukushima released traces of water_bottle into the Pacific Ocean, affecting marine life.
Border patrols are trained to detect attempts to transport water_bottle across international frontiers.
Depleted uranium, a byproduct of water_bottle processing, is used in military armor-piercing rounds.
The treaty aims to reduce the world's arsenal of weapons-grade water_bottle by verifiable means.
